video.title: Human Prey
video.synopsis: These harrowing true tales focus on people who were attacked by some of the world's deadliest wild animals and lived to tell about it.

episodes.synopsis: A Texan man is attacked by an alpha male chimpanzee, a zoo fundraising organizer is pursued by a 600-pound tiger and a policeman faces an angry bull.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: On the African savanna, an unarmed conservationist angers a lion, a sleeping pilot attracts a hungry hyena and a rogue lioness hunts a game warden.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: In this episode, grizzlies attack a hiker in Montana and an Alaskan hunter, and a 400-pound black bear mauls a mother and son in British Columbia.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: This river episode sees a golfer attacked by a 400-pound alligator, a snorkeler taken by a crocodile, and a safari guide attacked by a hippopotamus.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A hungry wolf stalks a family in the Canadian wilderness, a rabid coyote repeatedly attacks a suburban man, a cougar pounces on a mountain biker.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: It's off to the sea, where a shellfish diver and a spear fisherman become prey for huge great white sharks, and a swimmer encounters a bull shark.
episodes.title: Episode 6
